tasks.name: Fix TypeScript Build Errors
tasks.description: Resolve 6 critical TypeScript compilation errors preventing project build. Includes unused variables, type mismatches, and missing properties.
tasks.testing_strategy: Run typecheck after each fix to verify resolution
tasks.notes: Critical blocking issue - must be resolved before any new development

tasks.name: Fix Unused Variable in Analytics
tasks.description: Remove or utilize the unused 'stmtTrendingPosts' variable in analytics.ts line 67
tasks.testing_strategy: Verify analytics tests still pass after removal
tasks.notes: Simple cleanup - remove unused prepared statement

tasks.name: Fix Type Mismatch in Analytics Query
tasks.description: Correct string to number conversion error in analytics.ts line 913
tasks.testing_strategy: Unit test parameter type validation
tasks.notes: Likely needs parseInt() or similar conversion

tasks.name: Fix Database Type Issues
tasks.description: Resolve string/number type mismatches and missing upsertMetric property in database.ts
tasks.testing_strategy: Database operations tests with type validation
tasks.notes: Multiple type issues - check parameter types and PreparedQueries interface

tasks.name: Fix Missing Property in Queries
tasks.description: Add missing 'engagementByPlatform' property to queries object in queries.ts line 518
tasks.testing_strategy: Verify query object structure matches interface
tasks.notes: Add missing prepared statement or remove from interface

tasks.name: Create Platform Abstraction Layer

tasks.description: Implement factory pattern for creating platform instances with proper configuration injection

tasks.name: Implement Rate Limiting System

tasks.name: Build Rate Limiter Core

tasks.name: Implement Backoff Strategies
